sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen({ match }) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/product/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
Indietro

{product.name}

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 1 ? 'Disponibile' : 'Esaurito'}
) } export default ProductScreen
